me.dags.DaFlightManager.API

Class ADaFlightListener

  • java.lang.Object
    • me.dags.DaFlightManager.API.ADaFlightListener
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.bukkit.plugin.messaging.PluginMessageListener

    public abstract class ADaFlightListener
extends java.lang.Object
implements org.bukkit.plugin.messaging.PluginMessageListener
    This class should be extended in-order to provide your plugin a MessageListener that 'listens' specifically for DaFlight messages. You can provide your own code for events by overriding the abstract methods of this class. A 'message type' will be provided to allow easy differentiation of the incoming messages.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  ADaFlightListener.DFMessageType
      The DFMessageType can be used to differentiate the various messages sent from the client

    • Constructor Detail

      • ADaFlightListener

        public ADaFlightListener(org.bukkit.plugin.Plugin plugin,
                 boolean hookIntoNCP)
        Initialises and registers the DaFlight Listener. This listens for messages sent from DaFlight clients.
        Parameters:
        plugin - Plugin - the host plugin registering the Listener
        hookIntoNCP - boolean - set whether the Listener should hook into NCP to exempt players from movement checks
